so what do i have to do to download this game... sorry guys but i dont get this computer stuffslol...lol

1) Get WinRar if you haven't already got it.
2) Rightmouseclick on the .rar file you've downloaded
3) Extract here
4) Watch it being busy and extracting it
5) When done, there are tons of files.
5.1) For the normal Age of Empires, doubleclick on empires2.exe to play
5.2) For the expansion, doubleclick MYTH-age2_x1.exe to play.

That's all ;)

positive: yeah, thats a classic

negative aspect:
#1. graphics are terrible, colors f*cked 
#2. theres absolutly no audio in the cutscenes, and there are no cinematics

solutions:
#1 the only way to correct the colors is to terminate the processe "explorer.exe". After exiting the game, you do Ctrl+Alt+Del, "add task" and execute "explorer.exe" to make it run again.

#2, simple as downloading other torrent, here http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4071194/Age_of_Empires_2___conquers
in order to have the complete audio, you must have the cds, or get a full instalation.
